title: Judgmental
text: If you have a ‚Äúpast‚Äù, be prepared to prove who you are now. I made a few bad decisions 7+ years ago. I‚Äôm not on any list. I paid my debt to society. AIRbNb wants me to provide them with multiple documents of who I became. I‚Äôll pass, and get a hotel instead. I‚Äôll spend the money that Airbnb didn‚Äôt want from me, and put it into large corporations hands.

title: Formally sue the hosts to get any resolve
text: You need to take the hosts to small claims court to get your money back.  If you don't stay in a place they need to refund you.  This is the rule of life.  Don't accept Airbnb rules....

title: Horrible Customer Service
text: I‚Äôve used Airbnb for years and never experienced and issue, until I did encounter one, and my lord it‚Äôs the worst and most powerless customer service department I‚Äôve dealt with. They will close out open cases without fulling their duties. They point to their policies as a way of preventing any action items. They do not value customer‚Äôs safety nor feedback. Read the reviews, all true regarding customer service nightmare.

title: Exemplary customer service
text: From beginning to end, each customer service representative performed at the highest level of assistance that anyone could ever wish for. I was particularly impressed with Rihanna who was patient and very knowledgeable. She was smooth, confident and thorough as she explained the process and expectations.

title: Be very wary
text: This app is blatantly misleading. They hide the real prices from you until you actually hit reserve in an obvious bid to get you to pay more than you intended. They let you filter by price but only price per night and because the fees they add on can be anywhere from 30-150 dollars per night it‚Äôs actually useless for getting properties in your price range. If you‚Äôre using a price filter doesn‚Äôt that probably mean you have a budget for your stay and so you want a filter for the total price? They obviously know that but it‚Äôs just a shameless attempt to force you to scroll through overbudget properties to price anchor you higher and tire you out until you give in and pay more than what you intended. Very misleading and manipulative. My guess is that most of their five star ratings are from years ago. I would attach screenshots to illustrate my point but I guess the App Store doesn‚Äôt let you do that.

title: update the UI

title: Coming and Going

title: Scam

When I try to get support they just close the case or make me talk to a robot. This app is a scam and they side with hosts that are scam artists.

title: Wild wild West
text: App is good but Airbnb has allowed the hosts to include not properly declared fees under the Host Rules that are not included in the total , every host in it‚Äôs own words with his own crazy rules, It used to be a set of common sense rules like: no fire , no drugs , no crazy music‚Ä¶  now it has things like: if you bring a pet is an extra $45 but if you are going to stay more than 10 days is $150 , if not properly declared the fees double ‚Ä¶ and all this in a field named extra rules with 20 paragraphs under the host rules 10 clicks/touches away from the checkout /submit button

title: Policy review
text: If you are thinking to leave a bad review on their app after a booked stay good luck because it will be taken down since you can‚Äôt even describe your stay without breaking their policy review plus they don‚Äôt even allow you to re edit your review so your review will never be shown.

title: Terrible

title: Filters & property categorization are broken.
text: I‚Äôve used AirBnB for many years. Unfortunately as the community has grown, quality control has plummeted. Dishonest hosts are taking advantage. Renting one floor of a single family home‚Äî with others living above and below you in that home‚Äî is not ‚Äúan entire unit.‚Äù A condo, apartment, duplex, or entire home is an ‚Äúentire unit.‚Äù Customer service was completely unhelpful. Super disappointing.

title: Reservation insurance is a joke
text: This application offers coverage, through Generali Insurance, for extra money just like other services offer. However, after years of loyalty‚Ä¶. I‚Äôm disappointed to inform that should you need to use it with an actual possibility like a car needing something fixed, you would have to qualify with things such as a terrorist attack causing you not to make it. It‚Äôs a total scam.

title: Hidden fees, terrible customer service.
text:
From being forced out of my apartment in Argentina due ti an emergency and being told by Air BnB I would not receive a refund (pipes burst at 4 an) to a 150 dollar cleaning fee that turned my ‚Äú$149 a night‚Äù overnight trip to sedona into 400 plus dollars (no mess was made, all house rules followed) Air BnB has been a terrible experience for me. 

I will never, ever use Air BnB again for a single service, and will always look to support their competitors.

title: Bad business practice
text:
Pulled up a felony from 13 years ago when i was a child.
 I appealed and sent information regarding the case and why that was not a good indication of who am as an adult. They still said no. 

That‚Äôs not the issue. The issue is allowing people to pay money to book then blocking their account after the background check. Forcing them to have to wait for refunds when they can check during profile set up. It‚Äôs a hassle because people can put their money into business that will be less judgmental thus saving them time.

title: Frustrated Super Host
text:
We‚Äôre Superhosts and have hosted on Airbnb for many years. Mostly, our experience has been positive‚Ä¶and much better than VRBO which was a terrible app. But there is something they need to fix before it comes up again for me.

First of all, however, I‚Äôm not a fan of the options available when setting up our cancellation policy for our guests. For a full refund, you can set it up for 24 hours out, 5 days, or 30 days. No differentiation between 1-night stays, which aren‚Äôt a big deal and week+ stays which are.

But my current frustration is that I recently had a one-night guest cancel 4 days in advance due to a family emergency. I told them if they cancel, I could refund their money. I‚Äôd done this for other guests in the past. But after they canceled, I found out this feature had been changed, and I could no longer do what I‚Äôd promised. I had to go through the support team, explaining the situation, having the representative misunderstand, explaining it again, and having them do what I should‚Äôve been able to do myself. And oh the joys of a representative telling you how to navigate the app when you already know how to use it well and know what they‚Äôre telling you won‚Äôt work.

Fix this please. If a guest cancels, and I wish to refund their money, I want the ability to take care of it myself.

title: Horrible !

title: Terrible hosts & Help support
text: I had gotten a terrible review from a host during my birthday. There was a heat wave & the house was facing the sun for 4 hours, making us air out the house. Upon being outside, a neighbors dog ran up to us and we took him in for the night. We were kicked out the next morning, even the rep refunded us because they understood how unfair the situation was. This was my first time using the app. Due to that review, I can‚Äôt book anything else. Help did absolutely nothing & told me to contact the host. Don‚Äôt recommend this app‚Äî so many others I‚Äôve heard had no chance to defend themselves against bad hosts, and there are more than you think. Do Vrbo.

title: Has gone downhill!
text: I use to LOVE this service until I went through my first horrible experience of bedbugs. I had photos of the bites (30+ bites) I woke up with after my first night AND admittance/confirmation of bedbugs by host via Airbnb chat.
